properties.description: Management consulting firm specializing in executive search, leadership advisory, and board services; 214 employees; Founded 2013; Headquartered in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia; Operates in the management consulting industry.
properties.content:
[Global Offices](https://www.amrop.com/global-reach/global-offices/) \| Jeddah

### Jeddah

The Headquarters Business Park Tower, Office 160

Taha Khusaifan Street/AlKurnaysh Br Road

23511, Jeddah, Saudi Arabia

[+966 12 261 3172](tel:+966 12 261 3172)

[info@amrop.sa](mailto:info@amrop.sa)

[Visit Our Website](https://www.amrop.com/sa/en/)

Amrop Saudi Arabia was established in 2013 and currently operates two offices in Jeddah and Riyadh, allowing us to serve Saudi clients locally on the ground. Historically, Amrop has been active in the Middle East as a retained Executive Search provider since 1997. Today, Amrop Saudi Arabia is recognized as one of the leading Executive Search firms in Saudi Arabia focusing on Executive Search placements for Senior Leadership and C-Suite roles across all corporate functions. We also offer other complimentary services to enable our clients to build more effective leadership structures and teams such as Leadership Advisory services and Board Consulting services.

At Amrop Saudi Arabia, we believe in establishing long-lasting partnerships with our clients and not just transactional relationships. This approach allowed us to become Trusted Advisors to CEOs, Boards and decision makers across the Private, Public and Non-Profit sectors of Saudi Arabia. We have successfully served clients across various industries, namely: Aerospace & Defense, Financial Services, FMCG, Healthcare and Life Sciences, Logistics, Transportation & Supply Chain, Hospitality & Tourism, Petrochemicals & Industrial Manufacturing, Real Estate Development & Construction, Retail, and Professional Services.

We follow a Context-Driven methodology to assure the success of every project that ultimately enables our clients to successfully execute their strategies and achieve their business objectives. We begin by investing quality time to understand our client’s business and the role in question. Based on our understanding, we design a unique Search Strategy that is meticulously crafted for each search assignment. As we are based in Saudi Arabia, we bring an extensive local network of contacts and knowledge of the Saudi market into every assignment. Additionally, when the need arises, we work seamlessly with other global Amrop offices to achieve a greater geographic reach in sourcing candidates and/or leveraging their industry expertise and network of contacts

Furthermore, our approach extends far beyond our database. In every Executive Search assignment, we conduct rigorous and targeted research to identify relevant candidates in the market. Once identified, we conduct thorough assessments to determine a technical and cultural fit; this process enables us to confidently offer our clients a 12-month warranty.

In addition to retained Executive Search, we offer Leadership Assessments, Leadership & Team Development, Onboarding and Executive Coaching, as well as Board Advisory services such as Amrop’s proprietary Board Evaluation Tool (BET ©), among other board consulting services.

\-\-\----------------------------------

We recognize that our role in protecting personal data is critical – on behalf of our clients, our candidates and Amrop’s executive search professionals. We are committed to ensuring that all personal data shared and processed within Amrop is protected, private and secure.

Read about Amrop’s approach to data protection [here](https://www.amrop.com/our-approach/privacy-data-protection/).

company.about: Management consulting firm specializing in executive search, leadership advisory, and board services; 214 employees; Founded 2013; Headquartered in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia; Operates in the management consulting industry.

evaluations.reasoning: The internal company profile for amrop.com lists 214 employees, which falls within the 201‑500 employee range required by the criterion. The profile is recent and directly pertains to the Amrop entity represented by the Jeddah office page. No conflicting data was found.

references.title: Executive Search Firm & Board Leadership Recruitment | Amrop
references.snippet: Amrop is a Business Consulting and Services company (private) with 214 employees (+2.5% YoY growth), $230.0M annual revenue, headquartered in Belgium. Recently acquired Humanis Calgary. Amrop is a global executive search and leadership advisory partnership, helping you find and develop leaders for what’s next. shaping sustainable succ...

evaluations.criterion: Company is headquartered or primarily operates in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (KSA)
evaluations.reasoning: The Amrop Saudi Arabia page states that the firm was established in 2013 and operates two offices in Jeddah and Riyadh, with the address listed as the Headquarters Business Park Tower in Jeddah. This indicates that the company’s headquarters (or primary operations) are in Saudi Arabia. The page also describes Amrop Saudi Arabia as a leading executive search firm in the Kingdom, further confirming its primary operations are in KSA.

evaluations.criterion: Company operates in the consulting management industry
evaluations.reasoning: Amrop Saudi Arabia is described as a leading executive search and leadership advisory firm that helps organizations find and develop leaders, offering services such as executive search, board consulting, and leadership advisory. These are core management‑consulting activities aimed at improving organizational performance and leadership structures, not services for individuals. The company’s website and LinkedIn profile explicitly state these advisory services for corporate clients, confirming it operates in the consulting management industry.
